summary: Frontend engineer at Datadog / Current keywords: #react #react-native #hooks #graphql

experience.description:
Member of the Data Science team, I'm working on the Watchdog product.
Our weapons of choice are React, Redux, and more and more hooks.
React <3 / Redux / Webpack / ES6-7 ... What else ?

It started with Backbone.js, it ended with lots of React, after a quite long EmberJS phase.

Particularly proud of the Solid product I was particularly involved in, as I helped to bootstrap it, and was responsible of its frontend development for almost the whole journey.

Determining the new user experience direction, features / Improvement of existing features
(Roughs / Mockups / Personas / Tests AB, ....)

HTML / CSS integration

JS development (backbone)

Developping new features inside a custom BackboneJS framework (Backbone Relational + Backbone Layout Manager + custom code)

Technos: Backbone, node.js (i.e. push server using socket.io), grunt, REST API

Deployment

LAMP + GIT

JS Tests (Mocha-phantomJS)
